name: VibeStream
description: An app that matches your music to your mood
goal: Create something cool for music lovers

tools.name: Problem Definition
tools.content: People struggle to find music that matches how they're feeling at the moment.

ideas.title: Mood detection through selfie
ideas.description: What if the app could scan your face and figure out what mood you're in?

ideas.title: Playlist based on time of day
ideas.description: Maybe the app could suggest different music based on what time it is

inspirations: Saw a TikTok about how music affects mood

notes: I think this could be a fun side project. Not sure if people would actually use it though. Need to think about how to make it different from just another music player.
